app_metadata.description: SFTPGo is a fully featured and highly configurable SFTP server with optional HTTP/S, FTP/S and WebDAV support - S3, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob
app_metadata.name: sftpgo

run_as_context.description: SFTPGo runs as any non-root user.

app_metadata.title: SFTPGo

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for SFTPGo

attrs.label: Image
attrs.description: The image to use for SFTPGo.

attrs.label: Stop Grace Period
attrs.description: The time in seconds given to SFTPGo to stop before it is killed.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for SFTPGo.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that SFTPGo files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that SFTPGo files will be owned by.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description: The port for SFTPGo WebUI

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Certificate ID
attrs.description: The certificate id to use for SFTPGo.

attrs.label: SFTPD Services
attrs.description: Enable one or more SFTPd services.

attrs.label: Enabled
attrs.description: Enable the service.

attrs.label: Port
attrs.description: The port for the service.

attrs.label: WebDAVD Services
attrs.description: Enable one or more WebDAVD services.

attrs.label: Enabled
attrs.description: Enable the service.

attrs.label: Port
attrs.description: The port for the service.

attrs.label: FTPD Services
attrs.description: Enable one or more FTPD services.

attrs.label: Enabled
attrs.description: Enable the service.

attrs.label: Port
attrs.description: The port for the service.

attrs.label: FTPD Passive Port Range
attrs.description:
The range of ports for passive FTPD services.</br>
Note that you have to make sure that ports within the range are not used by other services.

attrs.label: Start
attrs.description: The start of the range.

attrs.label: End
attrs.description: The end of the range.

attrs.label: SFTPGo Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store SFTPGo Config.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.description: The path to store SFTPGo Data.

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

1.1.1.readme:
SFTPGo

SFTPGo is a fully featured and highly configurable SFTP server with optional HTTP/S, FTP/S and WebDAV support - S3, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob
